Great work dude!|Added Longpress on toggle to have corrispondent settings (Again from jKay!)Added again Longpress Vol+/- to change songs and -now- also FM station (from jKay!)|Added few new packs:|Updated all packs apps-libs to KI4|Upgraded LGWidgets! Its themed to not alter the AOSP theme but has all feature and setting app! :D|Added CyanogenMod Music Player|Added CyanogenMod MMS/SMS app|Added IceCreamSandwich Music Player 4.0!|Upgraded ALL extra packs to KI3 parts!
